website_summaries.verdict: You'll have to buy all of the supplies you'll need for making Mehndi henna tattoos, but this guide will give you the basic knowledge to help you get started.
pros: Handy book with information and tips for henna tattoo techniques
Written by an artist with henna tattoo experience
Also includes design templates and a recipe for making henna paste at home
cons: Information in this book is somewhat basic, so it may not be useful for experienced henna tattoo artists

customer_reviews.title: NEWEST OBSESSION
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED!!! This kit has everything you need! This is my first time and I feel like a pro already!
customer_reviews.author: Elika

customer_reviews.title: Not a starter kit. Just the book.
customer_reviews.text: The book seems very knowledgeable on henna. I'm just disappointed that it did not come with some premade henna ink like some other reviews suggested it did. I was under the impression that it was a starter kit. But I guess that was my mistake. Good quality book. Nice photos in it.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great quality henna. Used for tattoos and it has a good stain. Make sure you give it time to release the dye once you mix with something acidic. I let it sit overnight with lemon juice and black tea and mixed in my essential oils in the morning. After about six hours I started filling my bottles and my fingers stained right away so he careful! It's very strong and if you make a mistake tattooing it'll leave a stain for a day or 2 before fading, EVEN IF you wipe it off right away. Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Crunchy Mama

customer_reviews.title: actually Pinterest may be better.
customer_reviews.text: Meh, save your money, no novel ideas in here, even for a beginner. Just go on Pinterest and look at henna, same thing, actually Pinterest may be better.
customer_reviews.author: ElNez

customer_reviews.title: Great book with good illustrations and everything you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book with good illustrations and everything you need to know to get started learning how to do Henna. She gives you the recipe and hints with possible variations. She also provides basic design components to get you started making your henna art. I am having a blast with her designs and templates as I practice on anyone who will let me apply henna on their hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Green

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed on how many pages it had
customer_reviews.text: When it first came into the mail without seeing it, I thought "wow, this is heavy" and when I opened it, I was amazed on how many pages it had! I looked into the book and found the origin of henna, how to do stuff for beginners, many designs for people of different experience levels, and how to take care of your henna. I am giving this a 5 STARS, because this is a very helpful book for beginners and even advanced people. I recommend buying this for people who truly want learn.
customer_reviews.author: WYZGUY

customer_reviews.title: this book is a wonderful introduction to how to make your own paste and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've received henna tattoos before and want to start doing them myself, this book is a wonderful introduction to how to make your own paste and designs. I also enjoyed the little history it had in it. I would recommend it to someone new to henna.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Tragedi Merlot

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner book!!
customer_reviews.text: This book has helped me enter the world of henna (mehndi). It has some great ideas and background info. It is just for beginners though.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for beginners 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: The tips and the designs that the book has is really good and enjoyed reading it so much!!! 4stars because the henna paste mixture in the book didn’t work.. I went back to use my regular henna paste simpler and faster (henna, sugar, lavender, water) 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Khloud Moh

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: Great book, very helpful and includes some simple henna designs and a henna recipe. Was a gift for my niece who loves designing henna and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Henna-licious
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what I was expecting in this book. I'm very pleasantly surprised with the details. I'm an amateur dabler in henna tattoos. This is a wonderful book. The photos are plentiful. Design ideas are varied. Even added in hints and suggestions. Lovely. Will be keeping this book for a very long time. Will even purchase as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kerowyn

customer_reviews.title: Educational and fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is a detailed book on how to create Henna Tattoos. Lots of photos, instruction and design patterns. I purchased it because my daughter likes to use colored pens to create drawings on her hands and arms. This way she gets more ideas and learns about a different culture and why they do this.
customer_reviews.author: sdakatoishome

customer_reviews.title: Informative and fun
customer_reviews.text: It breaks down design very well, and makes even the most nervous person see it as “easy” with practice. Gave it as a gift to my 14 year old niece and she’s already put it to use, and with impressive results. She is an artist, but this takes it to a whole new level of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Gives recipe for henna paste and shows how to begin doing patterns. Shows pictures of more advanced patterns also. Gives warnings about what type of henna powder to use to avoid burns and explains why the author uses certain products.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: NICE FOR BEGINNER

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.

I have some big project ideas and this book was the best spring board I could have ever hoped for!

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Henna Tattoo book
customer_reviews.text: I got this book along with 12 henna cones I ordered to help me with my first henna tattoos. It's perfect! It talks about where henna comes from, how to make your own, how to make your own cone, tons of guidelines and pretty designs to try, and how to put it on wood or leather objects-which I didn't know could be done. I started off with lots of small designs from the book and slowly tried the more intricate ones. There's also lots of helpful tips on the pages as well. I would highly recommend this book to any henna tattoo beginner or anyone who wants to learn about henna.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J.

customer_reviews.title: Great instructional book
customer_reviews.text: The directions in this book truly are easy to follow and I love the patterns in the back of the book. To me, none of them seem to be overly complicated once broken down into the individual parts taught in the beginning of the book. After reading this, I'm about ready to start mixing my own henna instead of purchasing pre-filled cones; maybe it will stain better, who knows?

I like that there are many helpful tips and inspiring images included. The book isn't very long or wordy, which makes it an easy one to get through before practicing the art of henna tattoos! If you would like to get started on making henna tattoos and you like a good book besides all the Youtube videos and blogs on this subject, definitely go for it!
